sec.p: The study area was the Northeast U.S. Shelf, which ranges from Cape Hatteras, North Carolina through the Gulf of Maine ( Fig 2). The focus was on species that occur in marine waters of the Northeast U.S. Shelf, but a number of these species use freshwater, estuaries, and offshore areas during some portion of their life history [ 46]. Thus the study area included freshwater systems, as well as the shelf and oceanic waters.

div.div: Map of Northeast U.S. Continental Shelf Large Marine Ecosystem.
